search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Method CRM (method-crm.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official URL for the Method CRM pricing page is: [https://www.method.me/pricing/](https://www.method.me/pricing/) .

extracted_content.content:

CRM pricing that suits your business
====================================

### Contact Management

$ 25

Per user per month

Billed annually

Or $28 per user when billed monthly

Simple lead and customer management to help you close deals and drive repeat business.

Most popular

### CRM Pro

$ 44

Per user per month

Billed annually

Or $49 per user when billed monthly

Powerful QuickBooks CRM to help you simplify your sales process and get paid faster.

### CRM Enterprise

$ 74

Per user per month

Billed annually

Or $85 per user when billed monthly

For growing businesses who want to automate every workflow from sales management to customer service.

[Try for free and sign up for a free trial with Method](https://signup.method.me/methodcrm)

Mix and match Method’s pricing options to create a plan that’s perfect for every member of your team.  
In your free trial, you’ll start with CRM Pro and can add CRM Enterprise features for as many users as you like.

#### Discover why thousands of businesses love using Method CRM

[Try for free and sign up for a free trial with Method](https://signup.method.me/methodcrm)

Frequently asked questions
--------------------------

Which features can I use during my free trial?

All of them! When you start your free trial, your account will automatically include all of the features in our CRM Pro plan. If you want the CRM Enterprise features, you can also add them for free during your trial.

Can each member of my team be on a different plan?

Yes, absolutely. You can mix and match plans so you only pay for the features each user needs.

What’s the difference between monthly and annual billing?

With monthly billing, you pay for your account one month at a time. With our annual prepay plan, you get a 10% discount on your account by paying for 12 months upfront.

What currency will I be billed in?

We bill in USD for all our customers except those from Canada. Canadian customers are billed in CAD.

What is your cancellation policy?

If you are paying month-to-month, you can cancel your account anytime.

If you sign up for an annual prepay plan, there is a 30-day grace period during which you may switch to a monthly plan without penalty. After 30 days, if you wish to cancel your account before the end of your prepay period, you will not be eligible for a refund.

Do you have specific plans for the field service industry?

Yes! Method:Field Services is designed specifically for service businesses. Pricing for this solution starts at $15 per month for field crew technicians and $45 per month for dispatcher licenses. You can also try it free! [Click here to learn more](https://www.method.me/industries/field-service-management-software/).

Do you offer special discounts for nonprofit organizations?

Yes! We have a CRM called Method:Donor that is designed and priced specifically for nonprofits. [Click here to learn more](https://www.method.me/nonprofit-crm/).

Can I change my plan?

You can upgrade your plan per user at any time. You can downgrade your plan per user at the end of your current billing cycle.

Can I talk to a real person about my options?

Of course — [chat with us!](https://www.method.me/pricing/#/) Our team is happy to help you figure out which plan is right for you.

How much does a CRM cost?

When it comes to CRM software, there is no single answer to the question of cost. CRMs almost always employ a “software as a service” (SaaS) model.

This means that as long as your business  uses the software, you pay a regular subscription fee.

The actual cost of a CRM subscription varies widely. It is calculated based on the number of users you want to add, but it depends on the company you choose and your business’ specific needs as well.

Generally, the smaller your business, the smaller your subscription fees will be. There are also free options out there, but very rarely will you find them worth your time.

Typically, paid CRM software costs anywhere from $12 per user, per month, all the way to $300 per user, per month.

The most affordable options are best suited for smaller businesses, while the more expensive ones work well for large enterprises. For most businesses, though, the sweet spot is somewhere in the middle. And that’s exactly where Method CRM lands.

What’s the best CRM for small business?

Method CRM is the best CRM for small businesses. Outshining the competition in its capacity for both customization and automation, Method CRM works best for small-to-medium sized businesses. Here’s why.

As your business grows, it requires more and more coordination. Method CRM knows this, and does everything in its power to strengthen your business’ coordination in a way that’s tailored to your specific needs. Method CRM automates your regular work processes to make life easier for everyone that works at your business, especially you.

How much does QuickBooks cost?

There are several packages that Intuit offers for prospective [QuickBooks](https://www.method.me/quickbooks-crm/) users. Before deciding which one’s right for you, the first step is to decide between QuickBooks Desktop and QuickBooks Online.

Once you’ve decided which base QuickBooks software is best for your business, you can consider their packages at each price point.

### For Desktop:

QuickBooks Desktop has two price packages, and charges on a yearly cycle. The basic package, QuickBooks Desktop Premier Plus, starts at $799 a year.

The more advanced package, QuickBooks Desktop Enterprise, starts at $1,340 a year. However, prices can vary depending on how many users will be on your account.

### For Online:

QuickBooks Online has four price packages. It also frequently offers 50% off the first three months for each package, provided you skip the trial and buy immediately. Without discount, the price points are as follows.

The cheapest option, called Simple Start, is $30 per month. Then, there’s the Essentials package, at $55 a month.

Next, is QuickBooks Online’s most popular package, Plus, at $85 per month. And lastly, they offer a high-end Advanced package that costs $200 a month.

Make sure to think carefully about your business’ accounting needs when choosing which [QuickBooks](https://www.method.me/blog/is-quickbooks-easy-to-learn/) package is right for you.
